description: This table stores carbapenemase tests performed for an NHSN LabID sample.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CARBA_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The carbapenemase test category ID for the NHSN LabID Event registry record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unknown


Polymerase chain reaction - Klebsiella pneumoniae carbapenemase


Polymerase chain reaction - New Delhi metallo-beta-lactamase


Polymerase chain reaction - Imipenemase


Polymerase chain reaction - Verona Integron-encoded metallo-beta-lactamase


Polymerase chain reaction - Oxacillinase-48 like


Modified Hodge Test


Carba NP


Metallo-beta-lactamase E-test 


Metallo-beta-lactamase screen


Other
